'''Arkit''' is a [[village]] in the [[Jalal-Abad Province]] of [[Kyrgyzstan]]. A 'pretty mountain village', it is south of Lake [[Sary chelek]] and north of [[Kerben]].  It is the headquarters of the Sary Chelek Biosphere Reserve.
